detaileddescription.para: Convenience macro for when no PHY is set.
Additional advertising data requested by an active scanner.
Additional advertising data requested by an active scanner.
Angle of Departure with 1 us slots
Angle of Departure with 2 us slots

briefdescription.para: Peripheral sleep clock accuracy (SCA) in ppm (parts per million)

simplesect.para: The maximum advertising data length that can be sent by an extended advertiser is defined by the controller.

briefdescription.para: Convert periodic advertising interval (N * 1.25 ms) to milliseconds.
Encode 40 least significant bits of 64-bit LE Supported Features into array values in little-endian format.

detaileddescription.para: Helper macro to encode 40 least significant bits of 64-bit LE Supported Features value into advertising data. The number of bits that are encoded is a number of LE Supported Features defined by BT 5.3 Core specification.
Example of how to encode the 0x000000DFF00DF00D into advertising data.

simplesect.para: The comma separated values for LE Supported Features value that may be used directly as an argument for BT_DATA_BYTES.

briefdescription.para: Encode 4 least significant bytes of 64-bit LE Supported Features into 4 bytes long array of values in little-endian format.

detaileddescription.para: Helper macro to encode 64-bit LE Supported Features value into advertising data. The macro encodes 4 least significant bytes into advertising data. Other 4 bytes are not encoded.
Example of how to encode the 0x000000DFF00DF00D into advertising data.

simplesect.para: The comma separated values for LE Supported Features value that may be used directly as an argument for BT_DATA_BYTES.

briefdescription.para: Encode 3 least significant bytes of 64-bit LE Supported Features into 3 bytes long array of values in little-endian format.

detaileddescription.para: Helper macro to encode 64-bit LE Supported Features value into advertising data. The macro encodes 3 least significant bytes into advertising data. Other 5 bytes are not encoded.
Example of how to encode the 0x000000DFF00DF00D into advertising data.

simplesect.para: The comma separated values for LE Supported Features value that may be used directly as an argument for BT_DATA_BYTES.

briefdescription.para: Encode 2 least significant bytes of 64-bit LE Supported Features into 2 bytes long array of values in little-endian format.

detaileddescription.para: Helper macro to encode 64-bit LE Supported Features value into advertising data. The macro encodes 3 least significant bytes into advertising data. Other 6 bytes are not encoded.
Example of how to encode the 0x000000DFF00DF00D into advertising data.

simplesect.para: The comma separated values for LE Supported Features value that may be used directly as an argument for BT_DATA_BYTES.

briefdescription.para: Encode the least significant byte of 64-bit LE Supported Features into single byte long array.

detaileddescription.para: Helper macro to encode 64-bit LE Supported Features value into advertising data. The macro encodes the least significant byte into advertising data. Other 7 bytes are not encoded.
Example of how to encode the 0x000000DFF00DF00D into advertising data.

simplesect.para: The value of least significant byte of LE Supported Features value that may be used directly as an argument for BT_DATA_BYTES.

memberdef.name: BT_LE_SUPP_FEAT_VALIDATE
memberdef.initializer: BUILD_ASSERT(!((w64) & (~BIT64_MASK(40))), \ "RFU bit in LE Supported Features are not zeros.")

briefdescription.para: Validate wheather LE Supported Features value does not use bits that are reserved for future use.

detaileddescription.para: Helper macro to check if w64 has zeros as bits 40-63. The macro is compliant with BT 5.3 Core Specifiaction where bits 0-40 has assigned values. In case of invalid value, build time error is reported.

briefdescription.para: Bluetooth Generic Access Profile defines and Assigned Numbers.
